title: punishment
body: look my internet wasn't working and it cut out so I couldn't get  in and my league wouldn't let me in the game so I got 5 ques for twenty minute but it wasn't my fault that league wouldn't let me in so u should take those ques off plz

replies.body:
Unfortunately, regardless of your own intent, your absence negatively impacts *everyone* in the match. This is just one reason as to why the system treats all disconnections equally and why we're not able to remove these penalties.

If you require assistance in troubleshooting your internet problem, please let me know.

Than kill the match instead of having dumb 15 minute LB queues.  You would have less of a negative impact.

Your in game FF@3min this only works if its a complete DC but if he "reconnects" and he moves it cancels it.  He ends up DCing 5 more times while now is 4v5.
